law.text: An adult person over eighteen (18) years of age may be adopted in the same manner as provided by law for the adoption of a child and with the same legal effect, except that his consent alone to such adoption shall be required.
law.history: Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 6. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 1.
